com.vangav.backend.images.segments_and_features

Class FeatureGridSpaces

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.images.segments_and_features.Feature
      • com.vangav.backend.images.segments_and_features.FeatureGridSpaces

  • public class FeatureGridSpaces
extends Feature
    |--A--|--B--|--C--| 1-----------------4 ------------------- 2--D--|--E--|--F--5 ------------------- 3-----------------6 |--G--|--H--|--I--| FeatureGridSpaces gets the percentage of empty spaces along the lines of a segment's grid For example if the segment has the letter O the following will approximately represent this feature according to the drawing above: A: 40% B: 0% C: 40% D: 0% E: 80% F: 0% G: 40% H: 0% I: 40% 1: 40% 2: 0% 3: 40% 4: 40% 5: 0% 6: 40%
